text: aur insaan ko jab koee nukasaan chhoo bhee gaya to apane pahaloo par (leta ho) ya baitha ho ya khada (garaz har haalat mein) ham ko pukaarata hai phir jab ham usase usakee takaleeph ko door kar dete hai to aisa khisak jaata hai jaise usane takaleeph ke (dapha karane ke) lie jo usako pahunchatee thee hamako pukaara hee na tha jo log jyaadatee karate hain unakee kaarastaaniyaan yoon hee unhen achchhee kar dikhaee gaee hain
